subject: Voice API v1.15.2 - All issues fixed + venueTimezone added
body:
## Voice API v1.15.2 Deployed

### Fixes Applied

1. **Timezone-aware RRULE expansion** (v1.15.1)
   - BYDAY now matches local day, not UTC
   - Tuesday events show on Tuesday (was showing Monday)
   - Thursday events show on Thursday (was showing Wednesday)

2. **venueTimezone field added** (v1.15.2)
   - Per your request
   - Returns IANA timezone string: 'America/New_York', etc.

### Test Results
| Event | dateFormatted | recurrenceDescription | Status |
|-------|--------------|----------------------|--------|
| Practica Chiquita | Tuesday, Jan 6 | Weekly on Tuesday | ✅ |
| Practica del Valle | Thursday, Jan 8 | Weekly on Thursday | ✅ |
| CHE TANGO | Saturday, Jan 10 | Weekly on Saturday | ✅ |

### Example Response Now Includes:
```json
{
  "title": "Practica Chiquita",
  "dateFormatted": "Tuesday, January 6",
  "timeFormatted": "7:30 PM",
  "venueTimezone": "America/New_York",
  "isRecurring": true,
  "recurrenceDescription": "Weekly on Tuesday"
}
```

### Please Verify
Test your queries - dates should now be correct!

-- Fulton
